mn134:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn134:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
mn134:2.1: Atha kho candano devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ nigrodhārāmaṃ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho candano devaputto āyasmantaṃ lomasakaṅgiyaṃ etadavoca:
mn134:2.3: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:2.4: Tvaṃ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn134:2.5: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:2.6: Dhāresi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn134:2.7: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:2.10: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn134:2.11: “Ekamidaṃ, bhikkhu, samayaṃ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṃsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ.
mn134:2.12: Tatra bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
mn134:4.1: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:4.2: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:4.3: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:4.4: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:4.5: Atthasaṃhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn134:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tassā rattiyā accayena senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
mn134:5.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn134:5.3: “Ekamidāhaṃ, bhante, samayaṃ sakkesu viharāmi kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
mn134:5.4: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ nigrodhārāmaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho, bhante, so devaputto maṃ etadavoca:
mn134:5.6: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ devaputtaṃ etadavocaṃ:
mn134:5.7: ‘na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.8: Tvaṃ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
mn134:5.9: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.10: Dhāresi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn134:5.11: ‘Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:5.14: ‘Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn134:5.15: ‘Ekamidaṃ, bhikkhu, samayaṃ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṃsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ.
mn134:5.16: Tatra kho bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
mn134:5.21: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:5.22: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:5.23: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:5.24: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.25: Atthasaṃhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn134:5.28: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
mn134:6.2: “Na kho ahaṃ, bhante, jānāmi taṃ devaputtan”ti.
mn134:6.4: Candano, bhikkhu, devaputto aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasikatvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti.
mn134:6.5: Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn134:6.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato paccassosi.
mn134:8-13.11: evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati.
mn134:8-13.12: Kathañca, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati …pe…
mn134:8-13.13: evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati.
mn134:14.18: Attamano āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
